title: CLIENT BUG

embed.description: AIGHT GENTS, IMMA MAKE THIS SIMPLE.** (Literally just made a reddit account for this. I've been lurking until now, but I saw this and said "I...

body:
If you're having trouble with the patching of the client. Follow these steps on the reddit thread. After a long time of repatching It worked.

If your client gets stuck at a certain % with 0kbs, please wait the files are still installing.
